name: A Crazy West Gunman
description:
This is a story which happened in the beautiful western of United States . In the west this vast land, a group of enthusiastic and fearless people, they have adventurous and hard-working spirit. They were the hero on horseback.

Danny live in a small town of the west, he like riding, shooting.he and his partners living a happy life.but in danny's 18 years old,
many bad guys come to the town.danny and his partners are very worried. one day, the bad guys take a beautiful girl away. Unfortunately this girl is the one who danny love for a long time.

For the sake of the peace of the town and the beautiful girl,danny decided to get rid of those bad guys. he start a adventurous journey.

Don't hesitate, you are the brave danny, come on , now Fighting up with your gun.

Features:
1. 5 game scene,30 gate, different shooting experience.
2. Flexible shooting mode, a better shooting experience.
3. Bad guys random appear, a better adventure experience.
4. Global ranking, see who is the bravest one.

Next Version:
1.More shooting targets, more beautiful scenes,more gate.
2.Add OpenFeint,add achievements
